metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11691 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in auth_profile.php in Cacti1.1.13 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viaspecially crafted HTTP Referer headers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
